body.data:
SELECT 
    ip.*,
    rel_data.ENTREGA_CLIENTE
FROM WINDOW.INTERCORRENCIA_PEDIDOS ip
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
        rel.numped AS PEDIDO,
        TO_CHAR(rel.dtretorno, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENTREGA_CLIENTE
    FROM (
        SELECT
            t.numped,
            i.datainclusao AS dtretorno
        FROM tab_saidamoto t
        LEFT JOIN (
            SELECT numped, MAX(datainclusao) AS datainclusao
            FROM tab_integra_site
            GROUP BY numped
        ) i ON i.numped = t.numped
        WHERE t.datasaida >= TO_DATE('{{ moment(DatePicker_Data_Inicio.selectedDate).format("DD-MM-YYYY") }}', 'DD-MM-YYYY')
          AND t.datasaida < TO_DATE('{{ moment(DatePicker_Data_Fim.selectedDate).format("DD-MM-YYYY") }}', 'DD-MM-YYYY') + 1
    ) rel
) rel_data ON ip.NUMPED = rel_data.PEDIDO
WHERE 
    ( '{{Input_id_intercorrencia.text}}' IS NULL
      OR '{{Input_id_intercorrencia.text}}' = ''
      OR ip.ID_INTERCORRENCIA = '{{Input_id_intercorrencia.text}}' )

AND 
    ( '{{Select_motoboy.selectedOptionLabel}}' IS NULL
      OR '{{Select_motoboy.selectedOptionLabel}}' = ''
      OR ip.NOME_MOTOBOY = '{{Select_motoboy.selectedOptionLabel}}' )

AND 
    ( '{{Select_filial.selectedOptionLabel}}' IS NULL
      OR '{{Select_filial.selectedOptionLabel}}' = ''
      OR UPPER(TRIM(ip.CIDADE)) = UPPER(TRIM('{{Select_filial.selectedOptionLabel}}')) )

-- ðŸ”¥ SÃ³ registros do dia de hoje
AND TO_CHAR(ip.DATA_INTERCORRENCIA, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

-- ðŸ”¥ SÃ³ pendentes (nÃ£o aprovadas)
AND ip.NOME_QUEM_APROVOU IS NULL;
